findings.title: Abnormal or suspicious activity related to the bridge or large token amounts
findings.description: The system lacks a service to detect and prevent abnormal or suspicious activity related to the bridge or large token amounts, which can lead to potential threats to the security of the network.

findings.title: ADMIN contract risks due to single entity control
findings.description: Risks arise from the ADMIN contract being controlled by a single entity, which may lead to malicious activity or mistakes resulting in loss of funds or compromised security.

findings.title: System Design Weaknesses
findings.description: The system lacks a service to detect abnormal or suspicious activity related to the bridge or large token amounts, and does not have a multi-signature wallet to oversee ADMIN contract management.

findings.title: Sensitive data exposure
findings.description: The SIGNER role's sensitive data and private keys are stored in an internal network inaccessible from external sources.
